snippet: A potentially deadly bacteria was discovered on more than one occasion at the plant of the Mexicali Cheese Corporation in Woodhaven.
lead_paragraph: A potentially deadly bacteria was discovered on more than one occasion at the plant of the Mexicali Cheese Corporation in Woodhaven.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Moves to Close a Queens Cheese Factory
